author: LatencyVariation
title: Minecraft 1.19 Released
content: The SMP will be updated once a stable version of PaperMC is available. To continue playing, you must be using a 1.18.2 client to join.

author: LatencyVariation
title: End of Season 1
content: Season 1 of the LucidSMP has now ended. There are currently plans for a Season 2 of the SMP however this has not yet been finalised and there is no set date. Thanks for playing Season 1!
